tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE word_freq ( word_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, word TEXT NOT NULL, frequency INT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE document ( doc_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, doc_name TEXT NOT NULL, upload_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );

CREATE TABLE doc_word ( doc_id INT NOT NULL, word_id INT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(doc_id, word_id), FOREIGN KEY (doc_id) REFERENCES document (doc_id), FOREIGN KEY (word_id) REFERENCES word_freq (word_id) );
CREATE TABLE analysis ( analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, doc_id INT NOT NULL, analysis_result JSONB NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (doc_id) REFERENCES document (doc_id) );
CREATE TABLE visualization ( vis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, analysis_id INT NOT NULL, vis_type TEXT NOT NULL, vis_data JSONB NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (analysis_id) REFERENCES analysis (analysis_id) );
